column5: causing many people to be injured
column7: Deputy Inspector for Traffic Police of Prasat Bakorng District
column8: said that this horrific incident occurred on the National Road Number 6 in Kandek commune
column10: Siem Reap province at 2.30 pm on April 12
column13: and Toyota Prius were involved in the incident.  Three people are reported to be seriously injured and others suffering light injuries.------The Deputy Inspector-General continued that the bus was carrying foreign passengers. It is unclear who was hurt as yet. After the incident
column14: at least one of the drivers ran away.------Rasmei News
